definition: ordinary/commonplace/mundane/temporal/of the material world (as opposed to supernatural or immortal levels)/every/all/whatever/altogether/gist/outline/note of Chinese musical scale
"dot" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 3)/see also 點|点[dian3]
out of the ordinary/unusually (good, talented etc)
out of the ordinary/out of the common run
lit. not a common chord (idiom); outstanding/brilliant/out of the common run
to descend to the world (of immortals)
mundane world (in religious context)/this mortal coil

sentences.english: With his feet on the mundane earth, Tripitaka was stunned.
sentences.chinese: 三藏腳踏了凡地，自覺心驚。

sentences.english: I refused my heart no pleasure.
sentences.chinese: 凡我心裏所念的，我都會讓自己享受。

sentences.english: Today, all who believe in Jesus are clothed in his Sonship.
sentences.chinese: 今天，凡相信主的也給穿上了祂兒子的名份。

sentences.english: Ling is a reluctant to see red fruits jie who, in the heart very length is not happy.
sentences.chinese: 凌桀看到紅果一啓齒就長短凡，心裏很不快樂。

sentences.english: And it shall come to pass, that whosoever shall call on the name of the Lord shall be saved.
sentences.chinese: 到那時候，凡求告主名的，就必得救。

sentences.english: Visible all sweating evil spirits are not sweat, wet disease in particular.
sentences.chinese: 可見凡發汗祛邪都不可使其大汗，溼病尤其如此。

sentences.english: All the biscuits that were sent were carefully weighed.
sentences.chinese: 凡送來的餅乾都仔細地稱量。

sentences.english: Yeah, When I get to the top of a mountain, I feel so satisfied.
sentences.chinese: 嗯酒色，免肉爬到凡頂，總會衣一種滿系感。

sentences.english: The stability of the above characteristics, and can be called the Hakka.
sentences.chinese: 凡符合上述穩定特徵的人，可以稱爲客家人。

sentences.english: Every tree that does not bear good fruit is cut down and thrown into the fire.
sentences.chinese: 凡不結好果子的樹，就砍下來，丟在火裏。

sentences.english: Of whom Nadab and Abiu died, when they had offered the strange fire before the Lord.
sentences.chinese: 納達布和阿彼胡在上主面前獻了凡火，遭遇了死亡。

sentences.english: To refuse baptism and to retract after baptism were crimes punishable by death.
sentences.chinese: 凡拒絕受洗和受洗後反悔的都以死刑論罪。

sentences.english: Bad people always come to a sticky end.
For whoever does the will of myFather in heaven is my brother and sister and mother.
sentences.chinese: 凡遵行我天父旨意的人，就是我的弟兄姐妹和母親了。

sentences.english: The government intervenes wherever the economy would be vulnerable if left to itself.
sentences.chinese: 凡經濟任其自流就會出問題的場合，政府就要干預。

sentences.english: Any parcels over the max weight should be repacked into small ones.
sentences.chinese: 凡超過重量限度的包裹應分爲幾個小包裹郵寄。

definition: key information/instructions/it must be borne in mind

(after a verb or adjective) one who (is) .../(after a noun) person involved in .../-er/-ist/(used after a number or 後|后[hou4] or 前[qian2] to refer to sth mentioned previously)/(used after a term, to mark a pause before defining the term)/(old) (used at the end of a command)/(old) this
to be considered to be/to be defined to be/to be called
its place/one's appointed place/the place for that
